snippet: New art books look at Winslow Homer in Maine, Mati Klarwein’s album covers, Joel Sternfeld photographs, the gaudy romanticism of Gustav Klimt and the Abstract-Expressionist Alps of Robert Motherwell.
abstract: Dana Jennings explores art books Weatherbeaten: Winslow Homer and Maine, Mati & the Music, Robert Motherwell Paintings and Collages, Joel Sternfeld: American Prospects, and Gustav Klimt: The Complete Paintings.
lead_paragraph: New art books look at Winslow Homer in Maine, Mati Klarwein’s album covers, Joel Sternfeld photographs, the gaudy romanticism of Gustav Klimt and the Abstract-Expressionist Alps of Robert Motherwell.

headline.seo: Art Books on Winslow Homer, Mati Klarwein and Gustav Klimt
headline.main: Old All-Stars Who Still Dazzle the Eye
headline.print_headline: Old All-Stars Who Still Dazzle The Eye
